I believe half the people on this ML are ready to give a tutorial, on
site...
Depends the price, he ! :-))

As you would give more infos on the location,
the place, the number of people to train & most & before all the type of
developmetn you are doing may be people culd help to provide an appropriate
answer...
Basic rate is app. 500 up to 2500 EUR a day + exepenses ( travel / hotel /
... ).
Conversion in USD should be similar but not necessaliry ...

Regards,

Thomas,
